entry.title: Maker DeFi Token Jumps 30% as Users Turn to DAI Stablecoin Amid Terra's Collapse
entry.summary: Amid Terra's collapse, investors have flocked back to Maker's native governance token and the DeFi protocol's native stablecoin DAI.

entry.title: GBTC Discount Hits All-Time Low as SEC Mulls Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), Grayscale Investment’s flagship Bitcoin product, is now trading at a historic discount below 30%.

entry.title: Twitter Shares Drop 19% as Elon Musk Says $44B Acquisition Deal 'Temporarily on Hold'
entry.summary: Elon Musk said that his $44 billion Twitter acquisition would be put on hold in order to determine how many users are indeed "fake accounts."

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Mount 9% Recovery as Crypto Markets Rebound
entry.summary: As a brutal crypto market sell-off concludes, the price of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies in the top ten have rebounded.

entry.title: Binance Halts Trading for Terra, Delists LUNA and UST
entry.summary: After warnings of delistings, the crypto industry's largest exchange Binance finally removed all trading pairs for Terra’s LUNA and UST.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Buys 7.6% Stake in Robinhood
entry.summary: News of the purchase sent Robinhood shares up 30%, hours after the stock hit an all-time-low.

entry.title: El Salvador’s Bitcoin Bet Is Down Bad: $37 Million in the Hole
entry.summary: After spending roughly $103 million to build a Bitcoin treasury, El Salvador’s holdings are now only worth around $66 million.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Jumps Nearly 9%, Whipsawing Amid Crypto Crash
entry.summary: COIN has been all over the place today following a rocky week.

entry.title: Ethereum Gas Prices Soar as Traders Head for the Stablecoin Exits
entry.summary: Average Ethereum gas prices were on track to quadruple over the past two days, thanks in part to stablecoin transactions.

entry.title: YouTuber KSI Says He Lost $2.8 Million on Terra in One Day
entry.summary: KSI says he has now lost at least $8 million in crypto so far and admits to having a gambling addiction.

entry.title: Binance Warns It Will Delist Terra's LUNA If It Falls Below 0.005 USDT
entry.summary: If the trading pair gets delisted, that would mean users can no longer trade LUNA for USDT on Binance.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Terra Temporarily Halts Blockchain to Prevent Attacks as LUNA Goes to Zero
entry.summary: With LUNA trading for 1 cent—down from over $80 a week ago—the validators take extreme measures to protect the network.

entry.title: How Web3 is Revolutionizing the Film Industry
entry.summary: Decrypt will be at Cannes Film Festival to discuss how Web 3, crypto and NFTs are changing the future of filmmaking.

entry.title: Yellen Says Crypto Poses No Systemic Risk to Financial System
entry.summary: The Treasury Secretary shared her concerns about stablecoins with Congress, but said crypto poses no "systemic risk" to the U.S. financial system.

entry.title: Chainsmokers Share New Album Royalties With Fans via NFT Drop in Music Industry First
entry.summary: The famous music duo The Chainsmokers' new album drop includes an NFT giveaway that gives 5000 fans a 1% cut of the royalties.

entry.title: NFTs Started ‘a Digital Art Renaissance.’ It’s Far From Over
entry.summary: As the .ART domain registry marks its fifth anniversary, digital artists hail a revolution in their industry.

entry.title: Buying the Dip: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Purchases $3M in Coinbase Stock
entry.summary: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest snapped up 546,579 shares of Coinbase as the crypto exchange’s stock fell to historic lows.

entry.title: Crypto Whales Tesla, MicroStrategy Underwater as Bitcoin Crashes to 2020 Prices
entry.summary: Bitcoin's current price means that Tesla and MicroStrategy are both down on their investments. Stockholders have also taken note.

entry.title: Blue Studios Launches Family Crypto Wallet With Unstoppable Domains Integration
entry.summary: The Wallio family crypto wallet, launched by Blue Studios in partnership with Unstoppable Domains, will allow admins to set spending caps.

entry.title: Terraform Labs Launches 3 Emergency Actions to Save LUNA, UST Stablecoin
entry.summary: In a race to remove all bad debt from the Terra ecosystem, Terraform Labs is pulling out all the steps with three emergency actions.

entry.title: Almost All $1.7B Crypto Stolen In 2022 Has Come From DeFi: Chainalysis
entry.summary: North Korean crypto hackers have already had their biggest year ever, stealing $840 million, according to a new Chainalysis report.

entry.title: Sorare to Launch Major League Baseball Ethereum NFT Fantasy Game
entry.summary: The popular NFT fantasy soccer platform will expand into a totally new sport starting this summer.

entry.title: Crypto Trader Running $5M 'Ponzi-like' Scheme Faces Nearly 4 Years in Prison: DoJ
entry.summary: Crypto trader "Coin Signals" has been sentenced to 42 months in prison for running a "Ponzi-like" crypto investment scheme, per the DoJ.

entry.title: Tether Loses Dollar Peg Amid Ongoing Stablecoin Crisis
entry.summary: Crypto’s first and largest dollar-pegged stablecoin lost its peg amid mounting redemption pressure.

entry.title: Cardano's Hoskinson Says 'Best-to-Market' Crypto Could Help Avoid Economic 'Collapse'
entry.summary: Hoskinson called the global economy a “train wreck,” but believes cryptocurrencies can help “restore some trust.”

entry.title: Is the Bottom In for Bitcoin? Market Sell Off Poised to Continue, Analysts Say
entry.summary: According to experts, Bitcoin may not be headed back into the green anytime soon.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits Lowest Price Since 2020 as Ethereum Nears $2,000
entry.summary: Watch out below. Get out of the way of crypto's rapidly falling prices.

entry.title: What Are Wrapped Tokens? How They Work and What They’re Used For
entry.summary: Wrapped tokens such as WBTC help move assets across blockchains. Here’s why they matter to the crypto ecosystem.

entry.title: Not Just Terra: ApeCoin, Avalanche, Solana, Shiba Inu All Down at Least 20% in Crypto Crash
entry.summary: The crypto market is deep in the red today, and these coins have suffered some of the biggest losses outside of Terra.

entry.title: After the Collapse of Terra's UST, What's Next for Algorithmic Stablecoins?
entry.summary: UST is just one of many algorithmic stablecoins on the market. Here's their path forward, according to stablecoin experts.

entry.title: 'Fire Sale Prices': Coinbase CEO on Stock's 87% Decline Since 2021 Debut
entry.summary: Brian Armstrong sought to reassure investors as the company's stock plunged to new lows.

entry.title: Crypto Firms Quick to Announce No Exposure to UST, LUNA
entry.summary: Stakeholders rushed to Twitter this morning to head off any damage caused by Terra’s stablecoin and native token cratering.

entry.title: Germany Won't Tax Bitcoin, Ethereum Sold After One Year of Possession
entry.summary: Cryptocurrencies can be sold tax free after one year of possession even if they're used for staking.

entry.title: Crypto Exchanges ‘Trading Against Their Customers,’ Says SEC Chair Gensler
entry.summary: He also took aim at the fact that the largest stablecoins all have ties to crypto exchanges.

entry.title: 'Cryptoqueen' Ruja Ignatova Added To Europol's Most Wanted List
entry.summary: The OneCoin founder allegedly fleeced investors out of as much as $5 billion in 2017. She hasn't been seen since boarding a flight to Athens.

entry.title: As Terra’s Dollar Stablecoin UST Collapses, LUNA Falls 97% to Under $1
entry.summary: While Terra's UST trades more than $0.75 from its dollar peg, the currency responsible for maintaining that peg, LUNA, is also in freefall.

entry.title: New Bancor Update Gives DeFi Investors '100% Impermanent Loss Protection'
entry.summary: DeFi veterans Bancor are rolling out a new impermanent loss-protected liquidity solution to make staking more accessible and efficient.

entry.title: Pan-African Crypto Exchange Mara Launches With Backing From Coinbase, Alameda
entry.summary: The exchange will become the official crypto partner of the Central African Republic, the second country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender.

entry.title: Terraform Labs CEO Do Kwon Outlines Terra's Path Forward for LUNA, UST Stablecoin
entry.summary: Breaking Twitter silence, Do Kwon of Terraform Labs has issued a new proposal in hopes of repegging the ecosystem's native stablecoin UST.

entry.title: Maker’s MKR Token Surges 30% and Stablecoin DAI Leapfrogs UST
entry.summary: While Maker's token MKR surged, its stablecoin DAI also became the fourth largest stablecoin by market cap due to UST's crash.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken
entry.summary: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
